00069 class ActorBase {
00070     private:
00071         friend class PhysWorld;
00072 
00073         protected:
00074         //PhysQuaternion orientation;
00075 
00076         //abstraction for other libraries
00077         Ogre::Entity* entity;
00078         Ogre::SceneManager* physscenemanager;
00079         Ogre::SceneNode* node;
00080 
00081         //btQuaternion* physorientation;
00082         //btTransform* physlocation;
00083         btDefaultMotionState* MotionState;
00084         btCollisionShape* Shape;
00085 
00086         virtual void AddObjectToWorld (PhysWorld *TargetWorld, btDiscreteDynamicsWorld* TargetPhysicsWorld) = 0;
00087 
00088 
00089         //Ogre Management Functions
00090         void CreateEntity(PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group);
00091         void CreateSceneNode();
00092         void SetOgreLocation(PhysVector3 Place);
00093         void SetOgreOrientation(PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z, PhysReal w);
00094 
00095         //Bullet Management
00096         void SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location);
00097 
00098         public:
00099         ~ActorBase ();
00100         ActorBase (PhysString name, PhysString file);
00101 
00102         void SetLocation(PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z);
00103         void SetLocation(PhysVector3 Place);
00104 
00105         void SetOrientation(PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z, PhysReal w);
00106         void SetOrientation(PhysQuaternion Rotation);
00107 
00108         void AttachToGraphics();
00109 };
